title: Miles at the Fillmore - Miles Davis 1970: TBS Vol. 3 / 2014
description:
Bill Graham had booked Miles Davis on a bill with The Grateful Dead at the Fillmore West at the April 1970 shows, and with label mate Laura Nyro in June 1970 at the Fillmore East run.

Heard in its complete, unruly, sometimes crazed glory, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Miles at the FillmoreÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ shows just how furious the evolutionary pace of DavisÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ music was at this point. Drawing heavily from Ã¢â‚¬Å“Bitches BrewÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, it captures Miles and one of his great electric bands really firing on all cylinders.

For the original 2-LP set Ã¢â‚¬Å“Live at the Fillmore East in 1970Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½, DavisÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ longtime producer Teo Macero edited down each of the four nightsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ performances into one sound collage. The four Ã¢â‚¬Å“suitesÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ were then each placed on one side of vinyl.
 
Recorded over four consecutive nights in June 1970 at the Fillmore East in New York City, this deluxe 4-CD package, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Miles at the FillmoreÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, presents the four evenings in full, remixed and uncut, plus bonus tracks culled from the April 11 performances at sister venue The Fillmore West. In total, thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s roughly 100 minutes of never-before-released music from Wednesday through Saturday at the Fillmore East, with additional 35 or so minutes from the San Francisco show. All of the material was professionally recorded to eight-track tape in 1970 and newly mixed for this release. 



Miles Davis

 4CDs / 2014 / Remastered / 320Kbps


Disc 1 (Fillmore East, Wednesday, June 17, 1970):

1. Introduction by Bill Graham 

2. Directions 

3. The Mask 

4. It's About That Time

5. Bitches Brew 

6. The Theme 

Bonus tracks (Fillmore West, April 11, 1970):

7. Paraphernalia 

8. Footprints


Disc 2 (Fillmore East, Thursday, June 18, 1970):

1. Directions 

2. The Mask 

3. It's About That Time 

4. Bitches Brew 

5. The Theme 

6. Spanish Key (Encore) 

7. The Theme


Disc 3 (Fillmore East, Friday, June 19, 1970):

1. Directions 

2. The Mask 

3. It's About That Time 

4. I Fall In Love Too Easily 

5. Sanctuary

6. Bitches Brew 

7. The Theme 

Bonus track (Fillmore West, April 11, 1970):

Disc 4 (Fillmore East, Saturday, June 20, 1970):

1. Directions 

2. The Mask 

3. It's About That Time 

4. I Fall In Love Too Easily 

5. Sanctuary 

6. Bitches Brew 

7. Willie Nelson 

8. The Theme

All Fillmore East selections originally issued in edited form on the double-LP, 
Miles Davis: At Fillmore, released October 28, 1970)


Personnel:

Miles Davis: trumpet

Steve Grossman: tenor and soprano sax

Chick Corea: electric piano

Keith Jarrett: organ (Fillmore East only)

Dave Holland: acoustic and electric bass

Jack DeJohnette: drums

Airto Moreira: percussion
